review: I've been using the Fire Stick for a week now and I'm very happy with my purchase so far. Streaming Netflix and Amazon Instant is not as laggy as  I expected based on my initial Network settings issue. It took multiple attempts for my Network and Fire Stick to sync but after a Network RESET, it was easy to load my account. We can update the REVIEW after I have time to play the games and stream music.
